title: Housing finance major HDFC pares 3% stake in Bandhan Bank for Rs 1,521 cr - Business Standard
content: Housing finance major HDFC pares 3% stake in Bandhan Bank for Rs 1,521 cr  Business Standard
description: According to bulk deal data available with the BSE, Housing Development Finance Corporation (HDFC) sold a total of 4,96,32,349 shares, amounting to 3.08 per cent stake, of Bandhan Bank
